Without breaking NDA, here are some random opinions of what was announced WWDC.

It does, however, make me wonder if they will be rolling out significant updates to their iWork applications on both OS X an iOS in the near future. – aw, yes!

(I wonder if they explained why they suddenly stopped using Big Cat names for OS X? Plenty of big cat names left!)
